title: Amazingly Fast Drip Irrigation Installer machine.

tasks.task: Breaking off lettuce leaves from a plant.
subtasks: Grasping a lettuce plant with hands.
Determining which leaves are ready for harvest.
Cutting leaves from the lettuce stalk using a knife or scissors.
Collecting the harvested leaves into a basket or container.
Adjusting the seat or starting the engine.
Driving the pan trader to the field or designated area.
Aligning the pan trader to transport items.

tasks.task: Trading items using a pan trader.
subtasks: Placing items in the pan trader's carrying capacity.
Negotiating the exchange with the other party.
Loading or unloading the items into the pan trader.
Resuming vehicle operation for the next task.
